mapper.select: SELECT B.ingre_idx, B.ingre_name, B.ingre_cat, B.ingre_content ,B.ingre_price, B.ingre_img, B.ingre_weight FROM recipe_ingre_info A, ingredient_info B WHERE A.ingre_idx = B.ingre_idx AND A.recipe_idx = #{recipe_idx}
select count(*) from recipe_wishlist_info where mem_id = #{mem_id} and recipe_idx = #{recipe_ingre_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from recipe_wishlist_info where mem_id=#{mem_id} and recipe_idx=#{recipe_ingre_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ingre_wishlist_info where mem_id = #{mem_id} and ingre_idx = #{recipe_ingre_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from ingre_wishlist_info where mem_id=#{mem_id} and ingre_idx=#{recipe_ingre_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from basket_info where mem_id = #{mem_id} and ingre_idx = #{recipe_ingre_idx}
mapper.update: update basket_info set ingre_cnt = ingre_cnt+1 where mem_id = #{mem_id} and ingre_idx = #{recipe_ingre_idx}
update basket_info set ingre_cnt = ingre_cnt+#{quantity} where mem_id = #{mem_id} and ingre_idx = #{recipe_ingre_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.ingre_idx, A.ingre_name, A.ingre_cat, CASE WHEN F.allergy_idx IS NOT NULL AND MDI.dislike_idx IS NOT NULL THEN '알러지 주의, 비선호 식품' WHEN F.allergy_idx IS NOT NULL THEN '알러지 주의 식품' WHEN MDI.dislike_idx IS NOT NULL THEN '비선호 식품' ELSE '일반 식품' END AS ingre_content, A.ingre_price, A.ingre_img, A.ingre_weight FROM ingredient_info A JOIN recipe_ingre_info B ON A.ingre_idx = B.ingre_idx JOIN recipe_info C ON B.recipe_idx = C.recipe_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ingre_idx, iai.allergy_idx FROM ingre_allergy_info iai JOIN member_allergy_info mai ON iai.allergy_idx = mai.allergy_idx WHERE mai.mem_id = #{mem_id} ) F ON A.ingre_idx = F.ingre_idx LEFT JOIN ingre_allergy_info D ON A.ingre_idx = D.ingre_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MDI.mem_id, DI.dislike_idx, DI.dislike_name FROM member_dislike_info MDI JOIN dislike_info DI ON MDI.dislike_idx = DI.dislike_idx WHERE MDI.mem_id = #{mem_id} ) MDI ON A.ingre_name LIKE CONCAT('%', MDI.dislike_name, '%') WHERE C.recipe_name = #{recipe_name}
